item.title: 16% of the top 100 MBAs from the Asia Pacific region
item.description: Business schools in Asia may be overlooking the potential of online MBAs. The Financial Times’s first ever Online MBA Rankings for 2014, which came out in March, contained no Asian business schools in its list of the top 15 programs. However, the region performs better in the traditional MBA format. The Financial Times’s Global MBA Rankings for 2014, published in January 2014, features a number of Asian schools within its top 50.
